Howard Baker told us that a treaty on strategic nuclear weapons was possible, but not probable in the remaining months of the Ronald Reagan administration. The president wants a good treaty, not a fast one, Howard Baker said.( What might Ronald Reagan have thought when our recent lame duck Congress rushed through a similar treaty last December?) '' Donald Rumsfeld says Bush invited him into the Oval Office just 15 days after the 9/11 attacks, when the focus was on targeting al-Qaeda in Afghanistan, and ordered a review of war plans for Iraq. Two weeks after the worst terror attacks in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were full occupied, writes Donald Rumsfeld . In his resignation statement, Mr Andy Coulson said: Nothing is more important than the Government's task of getting this country back on its feet.`` Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role.`` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on. Mr Andy Coulson joined Mr David Cameron 's team before the General Election and then ran the PM's communications strategy.
